attributes.action: Save the Novartis pharmaceutical factory in N E Lincolnshire from closure.
attributes.additional_details: If we don't have our own pharmaceutical production we will be too reliant on overseas manufacturing just when other countries have maximum demand.
attributes.background:
The Novartis factory is due to close just when we ned vaccines and testing kits to fight the Corona virus.
The UK government should take over this factory to keep UK pharmaceutical production.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition Novartis has announced that this factory will remain open.

If you want the Government to requisition or nationalise pharmaceutical production centres, you could start a new petition calling for this.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
